name: obsidian-cards-explorer
description: Unified file explorer with card previews and tree structure for Obsidian

scripts.release: npm run build && npm run update-manifest && git add . && git commit -m "Release v$npm_package_version" && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push origin main --tags
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release
